titleStmt.title: By the King. A declaration of His Maiesties cleare intention, in requiring the ayde of his louing subiects, in that way of loane which is now intended by His Highness
Proclamations. 1626-10-07
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White-Hall the seuenth day of October, in the second yeere of our reigne ... .
